description:
The Sleuth's Attire DLC includes the following outfits:

Clergy Cassock
Master Sleuth
The Consulting Detective

With the Clergy Cassock, you'll give the impression of a true man of the cloth, ready to absolve even the most hardened sinners.

Unleash your inner detective with the Master Sleuth costume. This sleek and sophisticated outfit will make you the talk of the town, and give your character the mystery and intrigue of a true virtuoso investigator, ready to solve even the most challenging of mysteries.

The Consulting Detective outfit adds a classic touch to your look and elevates your immersive experience.
name: Sherlock Holmes The Awakened - The Sleuth's Attire
